sentence: Chuck Edwards for Congress, Instagram.? Ad by ad, North Carolina state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R) has gotten more direct and sarcastic with his mockery of Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.).
author: David Weigel
title: The Trailer: The pandemic planner, the crypto billionaire and a bunch of angry Democrats

sentence: Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn simply cannot keep it together right now.
author: Paul Blest
title: Madison Cawthorn Is Having a Hell of a Week
